choices: The face of the enemy...or ally?...
1.content: You're looking around the area holding a map, looking for your new appartment, but on the way you see some men in an alley speaking and you go over to see what theyre talking about. "Da boss says we need to find some guy dumb enough to negotiate with us." says one. "Yeah but where are we gonna find someone stupid enough to help us?" says another. "Dont worry guys, im sure one will turn up. we just need to get them to accept our terms and the kingdom is ours!" says the third. "But we'd need to be real lucky to find someone that would help us on OUR terms, they're terribly unreasonable!" says the last. Scared about what they said, you try to leave, but you trip on a rock and hit a trash can. "Well, well, well boys, look what we have here." the first one says. "He's heard what we said, we're gonna have to kill him now that he knows our plans!" the second one says "Hey wait guys, i think this guy might be our special candidate."the third says. "i think youre right. now all we have to do is use the device and we'll rule the kingdom." says the last. The first one points a light at you and you faint.
1.title: the road to your new life

choices: decide to stay like this forever
11.content:
You wake up with a headache and feeling weaker than before. When you finally get enough strength to move up you see a girl in a pretty blue dress
(http://www.roxx-online.com/roxxonline/im...) with a very confused look on her face. you gather your strength to get up and try and comfort her but you fall face first on a long blue cloth. You rub your nose and look at your hand. it looks smaller and ore feminine. You go up again to comfort the pretty lady but you bump into a mirror. it turns out the pretty girl was YOU!
11.title: The face of the enemy...or ally?...

111.content: You touch your face many times and pinch yourself a lot to see if this is a dream or not. after several minutes you find out that this is real. You scream with your new high pitched voice at the top of your/her lungs. A guard comes in after a couple of minutes. "Princess whats the matter?" the guard says. "Huh? oh i thought i saw a mysterious figure in the castle tower down there." you say while pointing at a pillar thats almost on the other side of the castle. "We'll send our guards there right this instant princess. Have a good day princess" the guard said as he left. *hmm, princess* you thought. *Thats it! those thugs mustve turned me into the princess of the kingdom Annabelle Hyasho(silent H)!* after youre finished piling it all up you realize that you smell terrible from all that panicking. Should you take a bath or try and escape?
111.title: freak out

1112.content: You walk in the bathroom because baths calm you down when taking off your dress and unwearied and getting in the bathtub you fell the water on your "new" body you fell so calm that you forgot about the problem you wash your now long hair you being to some what like the fell of having long hair you then look down to wash your body were you see your "new" boobs which look like a good c size after you finish your bath and all dressed you do your hair in a pony tail you are then called to the dinner room which was a high table that was made for thirteenth or more people which starts fulling up fast half being knights one oh is about your age sits across from you how sometime looks at you shyly all you do is wive at him
1112.title: take a bath

choices: You leave, looking for the thugs
You see what type of things you have to do as the princess
113.content: You freak out, scared by what had just happened, and confused on how it happened. You think to yourself "Was it that light that did it?"... Then suddenly, you look down to see two big breasts and you smirk. You chuckle quietly to yourself and undress slowly. You walk up to a big mirror, you look at your breasts. You grip them, you like the sensation. You start to play with them, then you look where your penis used to be. You scream, and a guard runs to your room. You redress quickly as the guard runs in. "What's wrong princess?!" You say, in a feminine voice, "No, I'm fine, I just saw a spider". You laugh nervously as the guard walks out. You sigh. "How am I gonna fix this you say slowly" You then realize that you are a princess. "I probably have a lot of work to do in this body" You sigh again. "I have to fix this quickly". "I have to find those thugs, and force them to fix me." "But how in this body, I'm weak.."
113.title: check out your new parts

choices: Revolt against the thug and fight back
1131.content: You put on a heavy coat you find in the dress filled closet. You put the hood on and go out of the window. You stumble into the edge of the building. You look down to see 20 stories of air below you. You freak out, but you do not scream. You walk slowly to the edge. You grab the part that you are standing on. You crawl down to the grass. You look around to see guards at the side entrance. You sneak out of the area. You crawl over the fence and stumble to the ground. You run away without anyone noticing. "Good, I got away" you say quietly to yourself. You then bump into a stranger. "Sorry!" You exclaim. You then look up at the stranger, you see that it was one of the thugs. "...It's you..." You say. "Hah, I guess it worked, good, now time to use you!" The thug says, grinning in an evil way. You back away. "What are you going to make me do.." You say in a scared way. "You are going to bring us into power, you will make this place a living hell" The thug says to you. You don't respond. You just stand there, scared and confused. "Will you...change me back?.." You say slowly to the thug. "In time, once you do what we want" The thug says. "Now, go back to where you were, gather around everybody in the city, conduct a town meeting, and place down the new laws" The thug says menacingly. You gulp and nod your head. "Good, now scram!" The thug yells.
1131.title: You leave, looking for the thugs

info.brief_description: when thugs attack you in an alley you wake up as the princess of the country
info.description:
You're in the country of albion looking for your new appartment when you get attacked by some thugs in an alley you wake up as the princess of the country. As soon as you wake up you're shocked and try to find those thugs while finding a way to get back to your body.
Any good chapters I see, i will gift that person 250 gift points. Please try and add because i never have any time to add my own.
